title: Zamenboto Slackbot
subtitle: A slack channel bot that makes Chuck Norris jokes in Esperanto
description: Cxu vi sciis, ke mi povas paroli esperanton? Over holiday break, I wrote a slack bot that hangs out in #general in an Esperanto Learners slack. Whenever a user mentions it by name or mentions Zamenhoff (inventor of Esperanto), it responds with a Chuck Norris joke selected randomly from a sqlite database populated by calls to the Chuck Norris API. Because that's a thing. Thanks, Internet!
